channel.title: Members on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Members on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: OASIS OSLC Steering Committee Elections Coming Soon
item.description: Whether you live in the I/T or Systems world, software integration in heterogeneous environments can represent both a challenge (where do I even start?) and opportunity (how can I advance my environment to provide more value, deliver faster and with reduced risk?). Communities like openservices and OASIS OSLC collaboratively discuss lifecycle integration challenges and solutions that leverage open standards. Whether you’re here to contribute your knowledge and experience or to learn from others, we’re all in it together.
